cast.name: 约翰内斯·赫尔施曼 Johannes Herrschmann
阿德里安娜·阿尔塔拉斯 Adriana Altaras

introduction: The obscure philosopher Georg Hermes almost withdrew from the world to concentrate on his studies, especially Heraclitus, having no relationship since his mother's death. Three attractive young women who run a men's clothing store also share living arrangements. They have grown quite bored with the usual pick-up scene, with its endless series of one-night stands. When the suitably attractive and virginal young man, Georg Hermes, comes in looking for a new suit for a lecture about his new book, they collectively decide to adopt him as their boyfriend. One of their number, Franziska, takes him on a boating trip and seduces him, at the same time persuading him to give up his apartment and move into theirs. When he moves in, Beate and Marthe, the other two women, begin to shower him with sexual attentions, which out of loyalty to Franziska he tries to refuse. When he finally understands that responding to them is what she wants, he suddenly finds himself in a sexual situation undoubtedly the fulfillment of many a male fantasy.
